sentences.sContent: The front roller has jammed on the photocopier.
sentences.sCn: 复印机的前滚筒卡住了。

phrases.pCn: 事情搞得一团糟，陷入困境

words.tran: 堵塞的；拥挤的；轧住了的

trans.tranOther: if a moving part of something jams, or if you jam it, it no longer works properly because something is preventing it from moving

trans.tranCn: 果酱；拥挤，堵塞，阻塞；卡住
trans.tranOther: a thick sweet substance made from boiled fruit and sugar, eaten especially on bread

trans.tranCn: 压紧，拧紧；突然用力推；将…塞进，堵塞，挤满；使卡住；干扰
trans.tranOther: to push something somewhere using a lot of force, until it can move no further
